text: Monroeville is a city in Monroe County, Alabama, United States. At the 2020 census, the population was 5,951. The city is the county seat of Monroe County. == Literary fame == Author Harper Lee was born and raised in Monroeville. In her book To Kill a Mockingbird, the fictional town of Maycomb is modeled on her hometown. The book received the 1961 Pulitzer Prize for Fiction. == References == Category:County seats in Alabama Category:Cities in Alabama
title: Monroeville, Alabama
